___language.title: Language used for the generated documentation (en-US, fr-FR, zh-CN)

___disableCoverage.title: Do not add the documentation coverage report

___disablePrivate.title: Do not show private in generated documentation

___disableSourceCode.title: Do not add source code tab and links to source code

___theme.title: Choose one of available themes, default is 'gitbook' (laravel, original, material, postmark, readthedocs, stripe, vagrant)

___disableGraph.title: Do not add the dependency graph

___silent.title: In silent mode, log messages aren't logged in the console

___assetsFolder.title: External assets folder to copy in generated documentation folder

items.title: Close by default items in the menu values : ['all'] or one of these ['modules','components','directives','classes','injectables','interfaces','pipes','additionalPages']

___disableSearch.title: Do not add the search input

___disableDomTree.title: Do not add dom tree tab

___coverageTestThresholdFail.title: Test command of documentation coverage (global or per file) will fail with error or just warn user (true: error, false: warn)

___coverageTest.title: Test command of documentation coverage with a threshold (default 70)

___includesName.title: Name of item menu of externals markdown files

___coverageMinimumPerFile.title: Test command of documentation coverage per file with a minimum (default 0)

___hideGenerator.title: Do not print the Compodoc link at the bottom of the page

___disableRoutesGraph.title: Do not add the routes graph

___config.title: A configuration file : .compodocrc, .compodocrc.json, .compodocrc.yaml or compodoc property in package.json

___watch.title: Watch source files after serve and force documentation rebuild

___minimal.title: Minimal mode with only documentation. No search, no graph, no coverage.

___disableProtected.title: Do not show protected in generated documentation

___disableInternal.title: Do not show @internal in generated documentation

___includes.title: Path of external markdown files to include

___disableDependencies.title: Do not add the dependencies list

___templates.title: Path to directory of Handlebars templates to override built-in templates

___files.title: Files provided by external tool, used for coverage test

___output.title: Where to store the generated documentation

___disableLifeCycleHooks.title: Do not show Angular lifecycle hooks in generated documentation
